summary: Mission v9.6.0 Testing Complete - All features verified: 1) window.location.assign() for FLASH login redirection, 2) 'Mon Dashboard' button added to ChatWidget (goto-dashboard-btn), 3) Header épuré with only logo + search icon, 4) Video overlay clean (sound, reserve, profile/like/bio only), 5) Alignment paddingTop 28px, 6) Sessions visible below Reels (85vh), 7) Purple chat preserved
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ App.js L3389: window.location.assign(window.location.origin + '/#coach-dashboard') for Super Admin local check FLASH login
✅ App.js L3404: window.location.assign() for Super Admin API check FLASH login
✅ App.js L3416: window.location.assign() for active partner FLASH login
✅ ChatWidget.js L3705-3727: 'Mon Dashboard' button with data-testid='goto-dashboard-btn' using window.location.assign()
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L607-677: Header contains only logo (afroboost-logo) + search button (search-btn)
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L199-202: paddingTop: 28px for 5px gap between header and video
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L309-424: Video overlay only has mute-btn, reserve-btn, profile-overlay, like-btn - NO extra Partenaire/Horaires icons
✅ CoachDashboard.js L4002-4018: Single fixed logout button with data-testid='coach-logout-fixed'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.6.0 verified. Key changes: 1) FLASH login uses window.location.assign() instead of window.location.hash for full page reload - fixes double-click issue, 2) ChatWidget has new '⚙️ Mon Dashboard' button (goto-dashboard-btn) in user dropdown menu that appears after login, 3) Header is clean with only Afroboost logo and search icon (loupe), 4) Video overlay elements: mute-btn, reserve-btn, profile-overlay (photo/name/bio), like-btn - no extra icons, 5) paddingTop 28px for header-video alignment, 6) Sessions section visible below 85vh Reels

FLASH_LOGIN_WINDOW_LOCATION_ASSIGN.comment: Forces full page reload for clean dashboard state

CHATWIDGET_MON_DASHBOARD_BUTTON.visibility: Appears in user dropdown menu after login

HEADER_VIDEO_ALIGNMENT_28PX.comment: v9.5.9: ALIGNEMENT PIXEL - 5px exact entre header et vidéo
